com.opitzconsulting.orcas:orcas-maven-plugin
Last Published: 2017-06-30  | Version: 3.1.1
com.opitzconsulting.orcas:orcas-maven-plugin
Project Documentation

  • Project Reports

orcas:schemaSyncStatics

Full name:

com.opitzconsulting.orcas:orcas-maven-plugin:3.1.1:schemaSyncStatics

Description:

This can be used to do a schema compare and to apply the changes to the destination schema. The src-schema is used to read the information that is usually taken form orcas-scripts.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
createmissingfkindexes boolean - If true orcas will generate indexes for non-indexed foreign-key columns.
Default value is: true.
dateformat String - Dateformat used in scripts (only used for materialized view logs).
Default value is: dd.mm.yy.
dropmode boolean - If true drop table and drop column-statements are always executed. If false they are only executed if the column or table is empty.
Default value is: false.
excludewheresequence String - Ignore existing sequences which match the sql-where clause.
Default value is: object_name like '%$%'.
excludewheretable String - Ignore existing tables which match the sql-where clause.
Default value is: object_name like '%$%'.
extensionhandlerClass String - The Extensionhandler-Class to use.
extensionparameter String - Parameter for your extension.
failOnErrorMode Parameters$FailOnErrorMode - How to handle errors while exceuting scripts: NEVER: do nothing. ALWAYS: fail. IGNORE_DROP: fail, but ignore failures of drop statements.
Default value is: ALWAYS.
indexmovetablespace boolean - If true tablespaces of indexes are adjusted if neede. If false index-tablespaces are only used when creating an index.
Default value is: true.
indexparallelcreate boolean - If true indexes are created in parallel (they are afterward set to noparalle if specified as noparallel).
Default value is: true.
jdbcdriver String - The JDBC-Driver to use. Always leave as default!
Default value is: oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver.
jdbcurl String - The JDBC-URL to the database.
loglevel String - The logleve. Possible values: info, error, debug.
Default value is: info.
logname String - Logname for spooling.
Default value is: schema-sync-statics.
logonly boolean - If true statics updates only prduces log results.
Default value is: false.
orcasjdbcdriver String - The JDBC-Driver of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
Default value is: oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver.
orcasjdbcurl String - The JDBC-URL of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
orcaspassword String - The schema-password of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
orcasusername String - The schema-name of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
password String - The password of the database-schema.
replaceablesfolder File - Default folder for replaceable scripts (scripts that contain objects that can be recreated without data-loss or performance issues).
Default value is: src/main/sql/replaceables.
scriptfolderPostfix String - Default filename-ending for script files.
Default value is: .sql.
scriptfolderPrefix String - Default filename-start for script files.
scriptfolderrecursive boolean - Include subfolders of scriptfolder.
Default value is: true.
spoolfile File - (no description)
Default value is: target/orcas_spoolfile.sql.
spoolfolder File - The base-folder for spooling.
Default value is: target/log/.
srcjdbcdriver String - The JDBC-Driver of the src-schema. Always leave as default!
Default value is: oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver.
srcjdbcurl String - The JDBC-URL to the src-database. Defaults to jdbcurl.
srcpassword String - The password of the src-schema.
srcusername String - The username of the src-schema.
staticsfolder File - Default folder for tbale-scripts.
Default value is: src/main/sql/statics.
tablemovetablespace boolean - If true tablespaces of tables are adjusted if neede. If false index-tablespaces are only used when creating a table.
Default value is: true.
targetplsql String - Do not use this.
username String - The username of the database-schema.
usernameorcas String - The schema-name of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.

Parameter Details

createmissingfkindexes:

If true orcas will generate indexes for non-indexed foreign-key columns.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

dateformat:

Dateformat used in scripts (only used for materialized view logs).
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: dd.mm.yy

dropmode:

If true drop table and drop column-statements are always executed. If false they are only executed if the column or table is empty.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false

excludewheresequence:

Ignore existing sequences which match the sql-where clause.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: object_name like '%$%'

excludewheretable:

Ignore existing tables which match the sql-where clause.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: object_name like '%$%'

extensionhandlerClass:

The Extensionhandler-Class to use.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

extensionparameter:

Parameter for your extension.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

failOnErrorMode:

How to handle errors while exceuting scripts: NEVER: do nothing. ALWAYS: fail. IGNORE_DROP: fail, but ignore failures of drop statements.
  • Type: de.opitzconsulting.orcas.diff.Parameters$FailOnErrorMode
  • Required: No
  • Default: ALWAYS

indexmovetablespace:

If true tablespaces of indexes are adjusted if neede. If false index-tablespaces are only used when creating an index.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

indexparallelcreate:

If true indexes are created in parallel (they are afterward set to noparalle if specified as noparallel).
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

jdbcdriver:

The JDBC-Driver to use. Always leave as default!
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver

jdbcurl:

The JDBC-URL to the database.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

loglevel:

The logleve. Possible values: info, error, debug.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: info

logname:

Logname for spooling.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: schema-sync-statics

logonly:

If true statics updates only prduces log results.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false

orcasjdbcdriver:

The JDBC-Driver of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver

orcasjdbcurl:

The JDBC-URL of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

orcaspassword:

The schema-password of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

orcasusername:

The schema-name of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

password:

The password of the database-schema.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

replaceablesfolder:

Default folder for replaceable scripts (scripts that contain objects that can be recreated without data-loss or performance issues).
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: src/main/sql/replaceables

scriptfolderPostfix:

Default filename-ending for script files.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: .sql

scriptfolderPrefix:

Default filename-start for script files.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

scriptfolderrecursive:

Include subfolders of scriptfolder.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

spoolfile:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: target/orcas_spoolfile.sql

spoolfolder:

The base-folder for spooling.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: target/log/

srcjdbcdriver:

The JDBC-Driver of the src-schema. Always leave as default!
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver

srcjdbcurl:

The JDBC-URL to the src-database. Defaults to jdbcurl.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

srcpassword:

The password of the src-schema.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

srcusername:

The username of the src-schema.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

staticsfolder:

Default folder for tbale-scripts.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: src/main/sql/statics

tablemovetablespace:

If true tablespaces of tables are adjusted if neede. If false index-tablespaces are only used when creating a table.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

Do not use this.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

The username of the database-schema.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No

The schema-name of the orcas user. Only needed if orcas should be installed into the database.
  • Type: java.lang.String
